title: Android Developer (m/f/x)
body:
Our client is an Austrian based company with an innovative approach to scalable cloud video-conferencing solutions. The company is highly rated by Gartner. They create solutions that make a change and use modern technologies to craft real-time experiences for B2B and B2C markets. The company is headquartered in Graz. Working from Vienna region is also welcome.

Android Developer (m/f/x)

Your Role & Responsibilty
  • Design and implement mobile applications
  • Develop Android frameworks with state of the art technology
  • Realize new features in close cooperation with designers, developers and marketing as well as product management
  • Decide about technical architecture in a team
  • Implement innovative ideas

Your Skills & Experience
  • 2+ years experience with development of Android applications
  • Expertise in Java and Android frameworks
  • Experience with Continuous Integration an Testautomation
  • Skilled in writing clean code
  • Problem solver
  • Very good englisch language skills required, at least some knowledge of german desired
  • Nice to have: academic degree in computer science or similar
Our Offer
  • Full or part-time employment
  • Room for personal and professional development
  • Working in a fast-growing company with international customers
  • Motivated and agile team with a common vision and a flat hierarchy
  • Headquarters in Austria
  • The minimum salary for this position is € 2.392 gross on a full-time basis (14x) acc. § 15 I. (11) ST1 acc. the Collective Agreement for Information Technology. Depending on your qualifications and experience, you will be offered an attractive salary.

If you are interested in this attractive career opportunity, please submit your application for ID Number 79.049 on ISG-CareerPortal or send an eMail.

Visit www.isg.com/jobs to find daily new job offers.
ISG Personalmanagement GmbH
Nibelungengasse 1-3/Stiege 4/Top 52, A-1010 Wien
Dr. Rupert Schmutzer, T: +43 1 512 35 05
@: bewerbung.schmutzer@isg.comAPPLY
